mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

I would like to confirm that the PEP screening data has been successfully analyzed, and the "Company PEP Screening" status has been marked as validated in the checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC.

If you have any further questions or require additional information, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
